description: This Dart source file defines the LibraryScreen widget, which displays a user's collection of ebooks in a grid view. It includes navigation to book details and search functionality, leveraging Flutter's widget framework and provider for state management.

classes.name: LibraryScreen
classes.description: Stateless widget that displays the user's library of books in a grid, with options to navigate to search and book details screens.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the LibraryScreen, including app bar, body with grid view or empty message, and navigation actions.
